016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.io;
017
018import java.io.IOException;
019import java.io.InputStream;
020import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
021
022/**
023 * ByteBuffer backed inputstream that supports mark/reset/skip.
024 */
025public class ByteBufferBackedInputStream extends InputStream {
026    protected final ByteBuffer byteBuffer;
027
028    public ByteBufferBackedInputStream(ByteBuffer buf) {
029        byteBuffer = buf;
030    }
031
032    @Override
033    public int available() {
034        return byteBuffer.remaining();
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public int read() throws IOException {
039        return byteBuffer.hasRemaining() ? (byteBuffer.get() & 0xFF) : -1;
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public int read(byte[] bytes, int off, int len) throws IOException {
044        if (!byteBuffer.hasRemaining())
045        {
046            return -1;
047        }
048
049        len = Math.min(len, byteBuffer.remaining());
050        byteBuffer.get(bytes, off, len);
051        return len;
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public synchronized void mark(int readlimit) {
056        byteBuffer.mark();
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public synchronized void reset() throws IOException {
061        byteBuffer.reset();
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public long skip(long n) throws IOException {
066        byteBuffer.position(byteBuffer.position() + (int) n);
067        return n;
068    }
069}
